technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.

engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and answers questions thoughtfully, but doesn't necessarily drive the conversation forward.
defensiveness: The participant does not display any defensiveness.

general_notes: The participant is a medical researcher and has a good understanding of immunology. They are generally pro-vaccine, but also have some concerns about side effects.
